name: Snivvian
Lore: 'Cadomai is the homeworld of the generally artistic Snivvians. Its cold, dark climate makes them excellent scouts.',
Text: 'May deploy as a ''react''. Power +2 under ''nighttime conditions''. When at a site, if opponent cancels Nightfall on related system, causes Effect to go to Used Pile and may retrieve 2 Force.',
